title: $:/plugins/linonetwo/simple-layout-launcher
author: LinOnetwo
name: Simple Layout Launcher
description: Vanilla style launcher, with Metro style square button and large icon.
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-gamification/tree/master/src/simple-layout-launcher">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/tw-gamification/tree/master/src/simple-layout-launcher"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://tiddly-gittly.github.io/tw-gamification/"/></$button>

!! Procedure

This plugin provides a simple layout switcher which can be used with this procedure call:

```tid
<<simple-layout-launcher>>
```

<<simple-layout-launcher>>

---

!! 过程

本插件提供了一个简单的布局切换器，它可以通过这个过程调用来使用：

```tid
<<simple-layout-launcher>>
```

<<simple-layout-launcher>>
